visualize

Alec Vercruysse 2021-06-24

Code to visualize the data produced by a spherical image scan produced by das_scan.spherical_scan with the logging option set.

visualize.get_dataset(path='data/')

Let the user choose which dataset to analyze

visualize.get_params(fname)
visualize.get_sorted_trace_files(path)
visualize.pick_file(files)
visualize.view_traces(fname)

For a specific capture file, view all the traces in the pulse as well as the delay and summed result.

visualize.visualize_scan(dataset)
